modName: Younger Looking Men - Optional 2048x2048 and now for Elves
summary: Makes your male (human) characters look much younger! Uses real face textures from free, high-res stock photos. Comes in 1024x1024 and 2048x2048.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#6D7B8D]*********************[/color]
Younger Looking Men
V1.3
[color=#6D7B8D]*********************[/color]

[b][color=#6D7B8D]Purpose[/color][/b]
[b]T[/b]he aim of this mod is to reduce the aged appearance of male characters in the game without sacrificing quality. This mod replaces the default texture files of the male face with new high resolution textures made from several free stock photographs found on sxc.hu. 

[b][color=#6D7B8D]Installation[/color][/b]
[b]T[/b]o install this mod, download the main file and drop the \"Textures\" folder into your Data folder, which can be found in your Skyrim directory. If you have Steam, it\'s under [i]steam/steamapps/common/Skyrim[/i]. 

[b][color=#6D7B8D]Compatibility[/color][/b]
[b]T[/b]his mod will not interfere with other mods and should be compatible with body texture replacements. [i]However[/i], this mod is not compatible with other mods that replace the textures of the male face.

[b][color=#6D7B8D]Feedback?[/color][/b]
[b]I[/b]f you have any feedback about this mod, please let me know in the comments or even send me a forum message. I will always take suggestions and critiques into account and try to implement them if they are reasonable requests.

P.S.: [b][color=#6D7B8D]Please help my gallery! If you would like to upload an image of your character using this texture, you [i]don\'t[/i] need my permission. I\'d really appreciate it![/b][/color]

[b]Want younger looking women? Go [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1898]here[/url]![/b]



[b][color=#6D7B8D]Thank yous[/color][/b]:
* Thank you to necKros for explaining specular maps to me, which helped me drastically improve my mod!
* Everyone who downloads and endorses!

[b][color=#6D7B8D]Note 12/25/2012[/color][/b]:
I could do a lot better now, so I have to admit I\'m a little embarrassed to still have this mod up - but I appreciate all of the endorsements and comments it\'s received so I\'ll leave it showing for now until I\'ve made something better. Thank you all!
[/center]
author: Emerj
